channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Haley and DeSantis praise Trump and melting ice slows Earth's rotation: Morning Rundown
item.description: RNC, Donald Trump, JD Vance, Usha Vance, ice melt, 'Rust' trial, Supreme Court Biden, Bob Menenedez guilty, Richard Simmons death, Amazon Prime Day sales

item.title: 'I went for a swim at England's highest beach and what I saw left me feeling sick'
item.description: Gaddings Dam, near Todmorden in West Yorkshire, is a popular spot for wild swimming, but the beauty of the location has been ruined by disrespectful visitors.

item.title: Woman describes out of body aura she felt in near-death experience after crash
item.description: 'The experience has allowed me to see the beauty of life.'

item.title: These are the absolute best Prime Day deals of 2024
item.description: Not every Prime Day deal is worth it. Our editors combed through thousands of them to find ones we think are actually worth shopping.

item.title: Jay Slater: Family lay flowers near scene of teenager's tragic death
item.description: Blue and white flowers, a bottle of water and teddy with a Union Jack jumper were laid on the dirt track not far from the treacherous ravine where the body of Jay Slater was discovered

item.title: Sheep start behaving strangely after eating 100kg of cannabis in greenhouse
item.description: The herd munched an entire crop of weed.

item.title: 23+ Prime Day products at the lowest price ever
item.description: Shop some of our favorite products — at their lowest price ever — from Apple, iRobot, Dyson and more this Prime Day 2024.

item.title: Hit-and-run van driver who fled after causing death of boy, 7, handed suspended sentence
item.description: William Brown, 7, tragically died after he was struck in a hit-and-run case last December. The driver, Stewart Powell, has now been sentenced after pleading guilty

item.title: Blind mystic Baba Vanga made a chilling prediction for 2025
item.description: 28 years after her death, Baba Vanga's predictions seem to be coming to fruition.

item.title: One dead as storms cause devastation and leave thousands without power in upstate New York
item.description: Severe storms and at least four tornadoes ravaged New York State overnight, leaving a trail of destruction and at least one person dead, with hundreds of thousands of energy connections lost to downed power lines.

item.title: Drunken brute murdered partner in sick stabbing while she sat on the toilet
item.description: The court heard that drunken David Liptrot lay in wait before he killed Caroline Gore on the toilet at her Wigan flat in 2023, with the defendant now awaiting a life sentence

item.title: Man tries to smuggle 100 snakes in his trousers and it goes as you’d expect
item.description: He was trying to walk through the 'nothing to declare' gate when he was stopped.

item.title: One dead as storms cause devastation and leave thousands without power in upstate New York
item.description: Severe storms and at least four tornadoes ravaged New York State overnight, leaving a trail of destruction and at least one person dead, with hundreds of thousands of energy connections lost to downed power lines.

item.title: Bizarre royal traditions during King's Speech - strict crown rule to 'hostage'
item.description: The State Opening takes place in the House of Lords chamber within the Palace of Westminster on the first day of the new parliamentary session - and it is steeped in ancient and bizarre traditions

item.title: England’s Euro 2024 semi final fate revealed by a ‘psychic’ and mystic meerkats
